title: Using the Source Interface
description: This guide provides an overview of the Source interface, detailing its use cases, setup, and examples for creating and using source objects.
author: Documentation Team

blocks.content: The Source interface can be utilized in various scenarios, including but not limited to:

Data Modeling
API Responses
Type Safety
To use the Source interface, ensure you have TypeScript installed in your project.
Example 2: Using Source in a Function
The Source interface is a powerful tool for ensuring type safety and structuring data in your applications.
